gui.supplementaries.amendments.title: Warning: Amendments is not installed
gui.supplementaries.amendments.suggestio: You can get the mod HERE
gui.supplementaries.amendments.message:
As of update 2.8.0 some of Supplementaries features in the Tweaks section were moved to a dedicated mod, Amendments.

 The mods are meant to function separately, but if you wish to keep all the already-existing old blocks you must install Amendments.

 The features moved are the following: WALL LANTERNS, SKULL CANDLES, CEILING POTS, CEILING BANNERS and SKULL PILES. 

Note that if you proceed without it, all those existing blocks will be lost.
message.supplementaries.quill_retry: A Cartographer's Quill could not find any target nearby. Try somewhere else.
